ayahs.meaning: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of all the worlds
The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
Master of the Day of Judgment
You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help
Guide us to the straight path

ayahs.arabic: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
ayahs.meaning: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have earned Your anger or of those who have gone astray

surahs.nameMeaning: She That is to be Examined

ayahs.meaning: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
And the earth discharges its burdens
And man says: 'What is [wrong] with it?'
That Day, it will report its news
Because your Lord has commanded it

ayahs.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
ayahs.meaning: That Day, the people will depart in groups to be shown their deeds

ayahs.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
ayahs.transliteration: Faman ya'mal mithqala zarratin khayran yarah
ayahs.meaning: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it

ayahs.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
ayahs.transliteration: Wa man ya'mal mithqala zarratin sharran yarah
ayahs.meaning: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it
Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you
Until you visit the graveyards
No! You are going to know
Then no! You are going to know
No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty
You will surely see the Hellfire
Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty
Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure
By time
Indeed, mankind is in loss

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
ayahs.transliteration: Illal-ladhina amanu wa 'amilu-s-salihat wa tawassaw bil-haqqi wa tawassaw bis-sabr
ayahs.meaning: Except those who believe, do righteous deeds, and advise each other to truth and patience

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
ayahs.transliteration: Alam tara kayfa fa'ala rabbuka bi'ashabil fil
ayahs.meaning: Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
And He sent against them birds in flocks
Striking them with stones of hard clay
And He made them like eaten straw
For the accustomed security of the Quraysh
Their security in the caravan of winter and summer
Let them worship the Lord of this House

ayahs.arabic: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Alladhi at'amahum min ju'in wa amanahum min khawf
ayahs.meaning: Who has fed them from hunger and made them safe from fear
Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
For that is the one who drives away the orphan
And does not encourage the feeding of the poor
So woe to those who pray
Who are heedless of their prayer
Who make show of their deeds
And withhold simple assistance
Indeed, We have granted you Al-Kawthar
So pray to your Lord and sacrifice
Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off
Say: O disbelievers
I do not worship what you worship
Nor are you worshippers of what I worship
Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship
Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship
For you is your religion, and for me is my religion
When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest

ayahs.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
ayahs.transliteration: Wa ra'aytan-nasa yadkhuluna fi dinillahi afwaja
ayahs.meaning: And you see the people entering the religion of Allah in multitudes

ayahs.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
ayahs.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirh, innahu kana tawwaba
ayahs.meaning: Then exalt your Lord with praise and seek His forgiveness; indeed He is ever Accepting of repentance

ayahs.transliteration: Tabbat yada abi lahabin wa tabb
ayahs.meaning: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he

ayahs.arabic: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayahs.transliteration: Ma aghna 'anhu maluhu wa ma kasab
ayahs.meaning: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained
He will burn in a Fire of blazing flame
And his wife - the carrier of firewood
Around her neck is a rope of twisted fiber
Say: He is Allah, [who is] One
Allah, the Eternal Refuge
He neither begets nor was He born

ayahs.transliteration: Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan ahad
ayahs.meaning: Nor is there to Him any equivalent
Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
From the evil of that which He created

ayahs.transliteration: Wa min sharri ghasiqin idha waqab
ayahs.meaning: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
And from the evil of the blowers in knots

ayahs.transliteration: Wa min sharri hasidin idha hasad
ayahs.meaning: And from the evil of an envier when he envies
Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind
The Sovereign of mankind
The God of mankind
From the evil of the retreating whisperer
Who whispers into the breasts of mankind
From among the jinn and mankind
